contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 7, 1905 D Langford Contest
Langford Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
langford-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Gems of Irish Melody
Manor Grounds, Langford, Bedfordshire Choice of test piece: "Gems of Irish Melody" or "The Mikado" - however it appears that either Irish Melody was the selected choice of all bands, or the rules were changed to have only one test piece.
1st prize £10 and cup 2nd prize £5. 3rd prize £3.
4 bands competed.
May 21, 2011, 7:18 p.m. Oct. 18, 2014, 9:27 p.m.
1 Burton Latimer Britannia Charles Harry Baker
2 Wellingborough Town Charles Harry Baker
3 Peterborough Excelsior Charles Harry Baker
4 Bedford Town Band Charles Harry Baker
